Title: Days of Our Lives
Writer: Allan Chase, Ted Corday, Irna Phillips
Actors: Alexis Thorpe, Alison Sweeney, Arianne Zuker, Crystal Chappell, Drake Hogestyn, Eric Winter, Erik Von Detten, John Ingl, Josh Taylor, Kirsten Storms, Kyle Lowder, Matthew Ashford, Melinda Clarke, Michael Easton, Patty Weaver, Peter Reckell, Valerie Wildman, Yvonna Wright
Plot: "Like sands through the hourglass... so are the Days of Our Lives." These words, spoken by late cast member Macdonald Carey, open every episode of this daytime drama, chronicaling the trials and tribulations of the citizens of the fictional city of Salem.
